Package com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.consumption

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConsumptionEndPoint
    Represents a source a DatumConsumerStream can be built on top of.
    DatumConsumerStream<TDomainClass>
    The base interface for a DatumConsumerStream, capable of providing clients with datum instances consumed from a data source.
    DatumEnvelopeFetcher
    The base interface for fetchers capable of fetching DatumEnvelopes from a data source.
    DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory<TConsumptionEndPoint extends ConsumptionEndPoint>
    A base interface to be implemented as part of adding a custom ConsumptionEndPoint type to Aletheia.
    DatumKeyAwareFetchEndPoint<T>
    Created by slevin on 1/1/15.
    FetchConsumptionEndPoint<T>
    Created by slevin on 1/1/15.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuditingDatumConsumerStream<TDomainClass>
    A breadcrumb generating DatumConsumerStream implementation.
    DatumConsumerStreamConfig
    Configuration details for DatumConsumerStreams.
    DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder<TDomainClass>
    Provides a fluent API for building a DatumConsumerStream.
    DatumEnvelopeOpener<TDomainClass>  
    InMemoryDatumEnvelopeFetcher
    Created by slevin on 8/15/14.
    InMemoryDatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory
    A DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory for building DatumEnvelopeFetchers capable of consuming data from endpoints of type FetchConsumptionEndPoint.
